snippet.title: Get Acquainted With Chicago Comfort Food
snippet.description: This is an out-and-out love song to Chicago…but first I have to make sure you don't take it as an insider's insult. When I plan a gastro-trip to the Windy City, I take its serious restaurants as seriously as I do the serious restaurants in any other major urban center: Paris, [...] read »

snippet.title: 48 Hours In Rome
snippet.description: On the heels of the Benedict XVI’s retirement on Feb. 28, we thought it was time to check out one of the world’s oldest—and most popular—cities, Rome read »

snippet.title: The Biggest Italian Dinner In History, Thanks To Social Media
snippet.description: In May, the Emilia-Romagna region of Italy was shocked by two significant earthquakes, just 9 days apart. Less than six months later, Italy is rebounding from the damage and getting back to business as usual in the best way they know - by eating. And you can be part of it! read »

snippet.title: Italian Travelers: Don't Miss Europe's Newest High-Speed Train
snippet.description: The big news in European train travel this year is Italy’s newest high-speed train, the Italo. Not only is the train itself, which can hit 223 mph new, but so is the entire concept - it is the first privately owned competitor to state-run Trenitalia. Everyone in Italy is calling it the “Ferrari train. “ read »

snippet.description: There are lots of great hotels in Rome, but the Hassler is the greatest of them all. read »

snippet.title: The World's Best Barbecue - Really
snippet.description: It's the most amazing barbecue you can imagine, better than that served in any restaurant, better than any that the majority of even the most dedicated foodies will ever taste. read »

snippet.title: Best Inflight Cuisine
snippet.description: Airline food has improved remarkably in recent years with some airlines going as far to hire celebrity chefs to create ethnic or fusion cuisine to serve their business and first class passengers. Hence, here are a few airlines offering award winning ethnic and fusion cuisine: Alitalia Since Italy is known for its [...] read »

snippet.title: Italy's Greatest Gastronomic Treasure, Emilia-Romagna
snippet.description: If you ask an Italian where the best food is in Italy, you almost always get the same answer. "Eh," they like to say. "At my mother's house!"…looking like "how could you be so stupid to not know that?" But if you push it to a regional discussion…as I have hundreds [...] read »
